stand_menu_text: Hello, user! This is a quick application activation program. For detailed information about possible commands press /help. To read the user agreement press /user_agree. To change the language press /change_lang. Please indicate if you already have a 6-digit code to activate your application?
greeting_text:
Hello, user!
This is a quick application activation program.
commands_text: For detailed information about possible commands press /help. To read the user agreement press /user_agree. To change the language press /change_lang. Please indicate if you already have a 6-digit code to activate your application?
user_menu_text: Hello, user! This is a quick application activation program. For detailed information about possible commands press /help. To read the user agreement press /user_agree. To change the language press /change_lang.
help_text:
This chat-bot is designed for convenient driver registration during cargo acceptance/dispatch. It can be used from a personal smartphone or at a dispatcher's desk.

Usage steps:
1. Starting the bot
Send the /start command in Telegram.
Select the communication language.

2. Registration. If you are using the bot for the first time:
At the desk, select the "No QR-code" option.
Enter the driver's license number, then Authorize. Then enter your personal data: Full Name, phone number.
Check the entered data and confirm it.

3. Authorization. If you have already registered:
Enter your driver's license number.
Check the relevance of the data, change if necessary.

4.Creating an application
Specify:
Pickup/delivery location (e.g., Moskovskoe Highway, 19).
Operation type: "I brought the cargo" or "I am picking up the cargo".
Client's application number.
Add the vehicle and trailer number (if any).

5. Obtaining a QR-code
After completing the registration, the bot will send a QR-code (or a 6-digit code) that needs to be scanned at the registration desk.

6. Using the code
Scan the QR-code at the registration desk. Your data will be transmitted to the system for processing.

Important! Make sure that you enter the data correctly and edit it if necessary before confirmation.
ask_vehicle_format: Please enter your vehicle number format
ask_vehicle_number: Enter the vehicle number in the format {vehicle_number_example}
incorrect_vehicle_number: You entered the vehicle number incorrectly. Input format: {vehicle_number_example}
ask_trailer_number: Enter the trailer number in the format {trailer_number_example}
incorrect_trailer_number: You entered the trailer number incorrectly. Input format: {trailer_number_example}
get_lang_enter_vehicle_number: Enter the vehicle registration number in the format A000AA00.
get_lang_incorrect_vehicle_number: You have entered an incorrect vehicle number. Input format A000AA00.
get_lang_enter_trailer_number: Please enter your trailer number in the format AA0000.
get_comment_text_for_user: To change the data, click the "Edit" button. To generate the 6-digit code required to activate your application at the next stage, press "{generate_code}".
get_comment_text_for_stand: To change the data, click the "Edit" button. To complete registration, press "{activate_code}".
request_key_text: Please enter your unique number key.
incorrect_key_text: You entered an incorrect key. Try again.
successful_activation_text:
Your registration was successful.

PLEASE APPROACH THE DISPATCHER TO COMPLETE THE DOCUMENTS.

Then wait for the dispatcher to call you to set up the gate.
activate_key_text: Here is your activation code: {key} To activate it, click on "{activate_button}".
failed_generate_key_text: Failed to generate code. Please return to the main menu.
contact_dispatcher_text: An error occurred. Please contact the dispatcher and provide them with the application numbers you are trying to register.
write_code_text: Please write down your unique key required to activate your application at the next stage: {key}
